sect2.title: System.IsLower
sect2.para: If AIndex is specified, IsLower returns true if the character AString[AIndex] is a lower case letter, otherwise IsLower returns false.

If AIndex is not specified, IsLower returns true if every character of AString is a lower case letter, otherwise IsLower returns false. If there are no case relative characters, or no characters at all in the string, IsLower returns true.
Dataphor uses zero based indexing.
